567070.name: Stellar Interface - Original Soundtrack
567070.description:
Experience the original soundtrack to Stellar Interface by Imagination Overflow! Composed by Stephen Pierce of Twin Ravens Audio, this soundtrack features 15 extended tracks of space-age synth goodness, perfect for battling intergalactic space overlords (or for responding to your 1,765 unread emails; you sick bastard).

Available in WAV and MP3

Track List:

1). StellarNet
2). The Ship
3). Bally
4). Deep In the Dark
5). Hober Mallow
6). The Factory
7). Homunculus
8). Hex
9). Lord of the Hive
10). Asteroids
11). Space Winner
12). Merchant / Jupiter
13). Graveyard
14). Babushka
15). Gilgamesh
16). Galactic Mayhem
17). Jupiter (Remix)
18). Mirror
567070.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 法语, 德语
